name: Ondras - Matrix Blockout (Total Lolipop Remixx)
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.000000
fDecay=0.999000
fVideoEchoZoom=0.999605
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000000
nVideoEchoOrientation=0
nWaveMode=0
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bWaveThick=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=0
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=0.001000
fWaveScale=4.325441
fWaveSmoothing=0.000000
fWaveParam=-0.200000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.710000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.300000
fWarpAnimSpeed=0.671653
fWarpScale=1.000355
fZoomExponent=0.900000
fShader=0.000000
zoom=0.999514
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=0.010000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=1.000000
wave_g=0.800000
wave_b=0.000000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.050000
ob_r=0.800000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.050000
ib_r=1.000000
ib_g=1.000000
ib_b=0.000000
ib_a=1.000000
nMotionVectorsX=64.000000
nMotionVectorsY=48.000000
mv_dx=0.000000
mv_dy=0.000000
mv_l=1.000000
mv_r=1.000000
mv_g=1.000000
mv_b=1.000000
mv_a=0.000000
per_frame_1=
per_frame_2=zmena=above(bass_att,1.35);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=x=zmena*int(rand(100*(1-delka_x)))/100+x*(1-zmena);
per_frame_5=y=zmena*int(rand(100*(1-delka_y)))/100+y*(1-zmena);
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=q1=x; q2=y; q3=delka_x; q4=delka_y;
per_pixel_1=action=above(x,q1)*below(x,q1+q3)*above(y,q2)*below(y,q2+q4);
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=zoom=0.9+action*0.05;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=neakce_x=0.003*sin(time);
per_pixel_6=akce_x=0;
per_pixel_7=neakce_y=0.003*sin(2*time);
per_pixel_8=akce_y=0;
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=dx=action*akce_x+(1-action)*neakce_x;
per_pixel_11=dy=action*akce_y+(1-action)*neakce_y;
per_frame_init_1=delka_x=0.15;
per_frame_init_2=delka_y=0.2;
per_frame_init_3=x=0.4;
per_frame_init_4=y=0.4;
